column5: I have an area to get worms beside my house and tonight I went out to get a couple.  In a 10 square foot area I counted over 30 big crawlers.  I took about 10.  If you need crawlers now is the time to get them.  They are mating and there are hundreds available. PM me if you live in Barrie and need some.  I can let you know where they are (they are probably in any field but this spot I know is crazy thick with them)
Yep, was out walking along some soccer fields about an hour ago and they're all over the sidewalk, makes for some easy pickins

Yes worms and tons and tons of frogs !!!!! The last few days driving to work at 4:30am I am doging frogs all over the roads up here in the kawarthas it's impossible not to run some over but there sure does seem to be more this spring than last year !!!!! Just sayin
You wouldn't pull up a couple having sex would you?
Those are the easiest one to grab. HAHAHAHAHA
Always.  IT is a 2 for 1 deal and I put them in the same container so ....
